html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-02832025-03-05HC
ActBudget Implementation Act, 2024, No. 1
SubjectOrder Fixing the Day on Which Certain Provisions of the Budget Implementation Act, 2024, No. 1 Come into Force (Food and Drugs Act)
PrecisOrder fixing the day on which Sections 325(2), section 330, and subsection 331(2) of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2024, NO. 1, COME INTO FORCE in order to (1) repeal the authority for the Minister of Health to issue a marketing authorization; (2) repeal certain references to marketing authorizations in the Food and Drugs Act (FDA); and (3) transition existing marketing authorizations to class exemption order made under subsection 30.05(1) of the FDA.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order fixing the day on which Sections 325(2), section 330, and subsection 331(2) of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2024, NO. 1, COME INTO FORCE in order to (1) repeal the authority for the Minister of Health to issue a marketing authorization; (2) repeal certain references to marketing authorizations in the Food and Drugs Act (FDA); and (3) transition existing marketing authorizations to class exemption order made under subsection 30.05(1) of the FDA.
